actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to specify that health maintenance organizations may provide the services of clinical social workers, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to provide that health maintenance organizations may provide the services of clinical social workers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to specify that health maintenance organizations may provide the services of clinical social workers, and for other purposes.
